data.message: Why all you sheep following a clone for eminem died years ago rip to the tru eminem not this fake luciferian clone

replies.message: How do you think I found this out believe what you want to believe truth will be out soon

Know other white rapper is near him so how would they find someone to replace him at that level, he's not dead and sorry still the most stupid shit I've ever heard it's funny I've looked at a lot of the reasons why people think I he's dead there really funny, he's not dead mate not being a dick or anything he's just not lol, peace out

It's not that I 100% believe it I'm 50 50 on everything I've done research pointing to him being cloned even Bob has admitted the cloning of celebs so again I'm 50 50 on everything in the world 50 it's real 50 it's fake
